source:
<!--
  ## Introduction

  The [`amp-facebook-page`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-facebook-page-v0.1.md) component allows embedding Facebook pages into AMP files.
--><!-- -->
<!doctype html>
<html ⚡>
<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>amp-facebook-page</title>
    <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
    <!-- ## Setup -->
    <!-- Import the amp-facebook-page component -->
    <script async custom-element="amp-facebook-page" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-facebook-page-0.1.js"></script>
    <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-facebook-page/index.html">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
    <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
  </head>
  <body>

    <!-- ## Basic usage -->
    <!-- The `amp-facebook-page` component only requires the href of the facebook post. -->
    <amp-facebook-page width="340" height="130" layout="responsive" data-href="https://www.facebook.com/imdb/">
    </amp-facebook-page>

    <!-- ## Internationalization support -->
    <!-- You can set the locale to render the page in a different language, for example French. -->
    <amp-facebook-page width="340" height="130" layout="responsive" data-href="https://www.facebook.com/imdb/" data-locale="fr_FR">
    </amp-facebook-page>

    <!-- ## Show different tabs -->
    <!-- Render the `timeline` and `events` tab for a particular Facebook page by specifying  `data-tabs="timeline, events"`. -->
    <amp-facebook-page width="552" height="310" layout="responsive" data-tabs="timeline, events" data-href="https://www.facebook.com/barackobama/">
    </amp-facebook-page>

    <!-- ## Facebook page cover -->
    <!-- Hide the cover of a particular Facebook page by specifying `data-hide-cover="true"`. -->
    <amp-facebook-page width="552" height="310" layout="responsive" data-hide-cover="true" data-href="https://www.facebook.com/manchesterunited/">
    </amp-facebook-page>

    <!-- ## Friends -->
    <!-- Hide the friends who follow a particular Facebook page by specifying `data-show-facepile="false"`. (Need to be logged in to see this.) -->
    <amp-facebook-page width="300" height="300" layout="responsive" data-show-facepile="false" data-href="https://www.facebook.com/itsdougthepug">
    </amp-facebook-page>

    <!-- ## Call to action -->
    <!-- Hide the call to action for a particular Facebook page by specifying `data-hide-cta="true"`. -->
    <amp-facebook-page width="300" height="300" layout="responsive" data-hide-cta="true" data-href="https://www.facebook.com/TCF.Pak/">
    </amp-facebook-page>

    <!-- ## Change header size -->
    <!-- Show a small header for the page by specifying `data-small-header="true"`. -->
    <amp-facebook-page width="300" height="300" layout="responsive" data-small-header="true" data-href="https://www.facebook.com/itsdougthepug">
    </amp-facebook-page>
</body></html>

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

The [`amp-facebook-page`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-facebook-page-v0.1.md) component allows embedding Facebook pages into AMP files.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

The amp-facebook-page component allows embedding Facebook pages into AMP files.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

The [`amp-facebook-page`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-facebook-page-v0.1.md) component allows embedding Facebook pages into AMP files.

sections.code:
<link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-facebook-page/index.html">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
<style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
</head>
<body>

sections.doc_: The `amp-facebook-page` component only requires the href of the facebook post.
sections.normalizedDoc_: The `amp-facebook-page` component only requires the href of the facebook post.

sections.doc_: You can set the locale to render the page in a different language, for example French.
sections.normalizedDoc_: You can set the locale to render the page in a different language, for example French.

sections.doc_: Render the `timeline` and `events` tab for a particular Facebook page by specifying  `data-tabs="timeline, events"`.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Render the `timeline` and `events` tab for a particular Facebook page by specifying  `data-tabs="timeline, events"`.

sections.doc_: Hide the cover of a particular Facebook page by specifying `data-hide-cover="true"`.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Hide the cover of a particular Facebook page by specifying `data-hide-cover="true"`.

sections.doc_: Hide the friends who follow a particular Facebook page by specifying `data-show-facepile="false"`. (Need to be logged in to see this.)
sections.normalizedDoc_: Hide the friends who follow a particular Facebook page by specifying `data-show-facepile="false"`. (Need to be logged in to see this.)

sections.doc_: Hide the call to action for a particular Facebook page by specifying `data-hide-cta="true"`.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Hide the call to action for a particular Facebook page by specifying `data-hide-cta="true"`.

sections.doc_: Show a small header for the page by specifying `data-small-header="true"`.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Show a small header for the page by specifying `data-small-header="true"`.
